bibl.title: The Composition of Aristotle's Athenaion Politeia. Observation and Explanation.
bibl.note: Examines the work in and for itself by means of a literary approach.
KEANEY John J., The Composition of Aristotle's Athenaion Politeia. Observation and Explanation.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 1992, 8°, xii-191 pp. ISBN 0-19-507032-1. £32.50.
